title: ORNOT WOMEN’S Lightweight Mission Shorts Have (Finally) Arrived
content:
ORNOT has been working on developing the women’s version of its Lightweight Mission Shorts since these first came out for men, years ago, and the day has finally arrived.

They didn’t want to rush a product to market without it being perfect. Perfect length, perfect fit and priced competitively at $126 for made in the USA is an incredible deal. Our team has been wearing the men’s version of these for years. From Ryan Wilson to Josh and John, they’re a favorite!

Specs:

  • Soft Elastic Waistband for mobility and comfort.
  • 7.5″ inseam.
  • Durable bluesign® approved Recycled 4-way stretch 85% Nylon / 15% Elastane fabric, made to last.
  • Full panel gusset to eliminate seams and pressure points.
  • 4 Pocket construction, 2 rear zippered pockets for secure storage.
  • Designed in San Francisco and sewn in Oakland, Ca.

See more at ORNOT.
